other_tests.findings: Fluid filled appendix is dilated with hyperemic thickened walls, with a maximum diameter of 12 mm. No significant adjacent fluid or fat stranding. Right adrenal nodule measuring 1.1 cm, stable in size from previous comparison study. Subcentimeter intermediate density cysts in the upper pole of the bilateral kidneys are stable in size from most recent comparison study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable size of the right adrenal nodule and cysts in the bilateral kidneys from most recent comparison study.
